meta.title: Contract #006: The Landlord
meta.description: PROPERTY DISPUTE: Analyze IoT logs. Differentiate between user error and system command.
meta.journal: The 'Steady Flow' log was a falsified entry designed to blame the tenant. The Admin Log proves the Landlord accessed the smart valve system remotely and spiked the pressure to burst the pipes. Insurance fraud.

nodes.text: 02:55 - Admin Log: Remote login to Building Water Control from IP (Landlord).
03:00 - Smart Meter: Critical pressure spike (80 PSI) detected.
03:00 - Usage Log: Constant low-flow detected (Tap left open).
03:05 - Tenant: Sends text 'Help, pipe just exploded!'
